data.eml:eml: Oriental bamboo delphacid planthoppers: three new species of genus Kakuna Matsumura (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha: Delphacidae) from Guizhou Province, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Xiang-Sheng, Yang, Lin (2010): Oriental bamboo delphacid planthoppers: three new species of genus Kakuna Matsumura (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha: Delphacidae) from Guizhou Province, China. Zootaxa 2344: 29-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.193344
